transcript:
Customer: Hello
Helllo
Executive: Haan ji madam good morning. Ye Uja Fiber Glass se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan haan madam Uja Fiber Glass se bol rahi hu.
Executive: Ji madam actually kal aapki mai Rishu baat kar rahi thi senior account manager from IndiaMART Noida office. Actually madam kal aapki account manager se baat hui thi Shivam se na jo aapka account manage karte hain. Right? Aur unki call feedback pe aapne no share kiya tha. To mai jaanna chah rahi hu madam kaha pe issue aa raha hai aapko services vgera me kya problem aa rahi hai aapne no feedback share kiya tha matlab you are not satisfied with the services.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello madam aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan aawaz aa rahi hai madam hello.
Executive: Haan ji madam aawaz aa rahi hai. Madam mai jaanna chahti hu haan ji madam aawaz aa rahi hai. Actually andar network nahi hai madam. Unka jo conversation hai madam wo samajh nahi aa raha hai. Aur means jo bhi wo conversation jaise samjhate hain wo clear nahi ho pata hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aisa hai. To jo steps se wo abhi follow karwa rahe ki aisa aisa karo to wo better mujhe nahi lag raha hai. Wo bol rahe hain ki sare product aap consume karo. Jo products hum nahi banate hain usko hum kaise consume kar sakte hain?
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul sahi baat hai madam aap. Kyunki mai jo bhi jo bhi product alag hum consume karenge to wohi hame dikhega na baki hamara product to hame dikhega nahi. To ye process bhi madam mujhe samajh nahi aaya isliye mai feedback me maine no kiya hai.
Executive: Mai samajh pa rahi hu madam. Madam dekhiye hum bilkul bhi aisa nahi bolte hain ki jo product aapka nahi hai aap uski buylead consume kijiye. Aap apne product ke related buylead hi consume kijiye kyunki allocation bhi aapke buying behavior ke hisab se hota hai na madam. Jaise aap buylead consume karoge waisa hi hoga. To us hisab se haan to us hisab se mujhe aayega. Mai galti se bhi koi aur product karungi to bas usi ka sab aata rahega.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Isliye kai baar hua hai ki maine dusra consume kiya to mujhe wohi dikha hai to mujhe benefit nahi hai na madam isme. Nahi sahi baat hai madam aap. Aur unki voice haan unka phir explanation clarity nahi mujhe samajh aaya ki kaise karna hai process. Explanation me bhi achha hona chahiye ki samne wale ko samajh aaye isliye.
Customer: Ji ji madam bilkul sahi bol rahe ho aap. Ye issue hai madam bas.
Executive: Madam agar dekhiye mai agar aap kehte hain to mai ye feedback unko convey karke unko better guide kar deti hu ya phir agar aap bologe to mai aapke account manager bhi change kar dungi madam. Wo aapko better. Haan madam kar dijiye aur mujhe aisa account manager chahiye na jo mere jo product pe hai thoda product pe focus karke hame matlab change karwaye. Matlab product pe hai na aisa product ka detail karwaye aur matlab wo product dikhe hamara IndiaMART pe aisa. Matlab by step achhe achhi tarah se wo hame bataye aur hum karte jaye aisa.
Customer: Ji ji ji. To madam change hi karwa dijiye.
Executive: Nahi mai wo to mai aapka bilkul kar dungi madam. Dusra mai ek cheez aapko aur bolna chah rahi thi madam jaise dekho aapke 48 product abhi hamare paas active hai madam hai na? 48 product active hai aapke. Thik hai. To madam hamare yaha pe dekho madam firstly agar aapka koi new product add hota hai madam to aap usko matlab seller panel se ya to aap hamari help se ya aap khud bhi usko add kar sakte hain. Haan madam maine kiya bhi hai already maine kiya bhi hai lekin usme kya hai jo keyword hota hai na madam wo change hota hai na. Keyword pe keyword ka jo process hai wo aap log karwayenge wo humse nahi hoga. Matlab keyword hum search kar rahe kuch aur wo product aa raha hai kuch aur to usko delete bhi karwana padta hai na madam. To ye to aap karenge ye to hum nahi kar sakte madam. Hum kaise kar sakte hain hum?
Customer: Madam mai aapko bata deti hu ek cheez IndiaMART pe aaj ki date me hamara jo system hai wo itna capable hai aap koi bhi right product dalenge. Aapne kisi bhi right product ki matlab name enter kara to wo automatically usko right mapping me kar deta hai. Otherwise madam aapke paas bhi usko option aata hai jaise maine abhi for an example aapka first product mai dekh rahi hu LCP rectangular tank thik hai. Agar aap dekhenge to iski jo mapping hai wo LCP tank aur rectangular tank me ho rakhi hai madam hai na? To do mapping already hai system ke through. Do hi kar sakte hain do se jyada nahi kar sakte. Ye mapping aapke end se bhi change ho sakti hai in case however ye kabhi bhi galat nahi hota hai madam. System hamara isko automatically product ko right mapping ke sath map kar deta hai. Agar kabhi rehta hai madam to wo aap matlab khud bhi change kar sakte ho ya aur madam hum ye suggest karte hain ki bahut frequently na aapko apne product ko mapping vgera ko change nahi karna chahiye because usse na phir aapka promotion hamper hota hai madam kyunki aap bhi samajhte ho jitna purana matlab jitni aap apni catalog vgera ko ek baar set kar lijiye madam. Bahut frequently aap uski image vgera change kar sakte ho for an example aapka image change hua price change hua hai na madam? To wo aap kar sakte ho but aise madam mapping vgera agar frequently change karoge to usse phir madam aapki search vgera ka bhi problem ho sakta hai. Actually ek product tha thik hai just wo product hamara hai lekin hum usko dal rahe hain na to wo abhi mujhe yaad nahi hai wo kaun sa product hai last time matlab teen month pehle maine kiya tha wo to maine usko dala product me lekin uske jagah pe na kuch aur tractor ka something upar ka cover aa raha tha.
Customer: Lekin material hamara dusra hai lekin wo consume me jo karna hai wo tractor ka upar ka cover aa raha tha matlab kuch misunderstanding ho jata hai buylead. Madam wo exact exact yaad nahi hai wo product kya kaun sa hai. To kabhi kabhi mujhe aisa lagta hai ki jo product hum likhte hain na uske sequence me bhi aa jate hain.
Executive: Ji ji ji aap sahi keh rahe ho madam lekin madam iska ek solution hai. Whenever you go in buylead section na agar aap for an example India filter deal karte ho to go to buylead section and waha pe aapka recent lead section me aap India filter laga ke check kijiye agar koi bhi inquiry aapko kaam ki hai madam aap usko consume kijiye aur jo kaam ki nahi hai aap usko not interested mark kar denge with the correct reason hai na madam. To agar aap aisa kar denge to wo automatic waha se hamare paas ye feedback capture ho jata hai aur agar wo irrelevant product se related hoga to wo aapka issue resolve bhi ho jata hai to aap NIC jaake jab not interested pe jaake na buylead ka feedback. Madam maine already bahut buylead me aaya hai aise maine bahut product kiye lekin wo again again wo product aaya hai.
Customer: Madam kyunki uski phir se usi tarike ki product ki buylead consume ho gayi hogi. Agar maan lijiye aapne kisi product ko matlab uski do se teen baar aapne usko negative mark kara aur aapne phir se us product ko uski buylead consume kar li ya phir us us tarike ki inquiry pe baat kar li to wo phir aapka active product me ho jata hai madam. To madam aapko ye bhi dhyan rakhna hai ki wo buylead aap phir se aisi buylead consume na kare. Aap usko not interested mark kare however madam dekho agar buylead allocation aapke product ke according hota hai agar hamara product right hai na to wo inquiry galat aayegi hi nahi hame sara problem jo product product se related hi hota hai ab jaise madam abhi mai check kar pa rahi hu aapne jaise ye aapka FRP rain water gutter karke ek category hai. Ye gutter wala na?
Customer: Haan ji ji. Isme madam aapne 63 buylead ko consume kiya hua hai but still aapne iski isko negative bhi mark kiya hai to wo wo mujhe jaanna hai ki kya isme aap deal nahi karte hain?
Customer: Nahi gutter wala system pe to deal karte hain madam hum log.
Gutter wala system hai na FRP gutter FRP gutter product ka name hai na?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji madam. Haan isme deal karte hain madam hum lekin negative mark to aisa maine kiya nahi hai lekin ab kaha se hua hai dekhna padega mujhe.
Customer: Thik hai madam ab mai mai ek mai catalog dekh leti hu agar same jaise issue jo mujhe hua hai jo again again aa rahe hain to mai aapko batati hu kyunki. Madam ye number phir haan haan madam ye number aap save kar lo agar kuch issue aata hai to aap mujhe bhi call kar sakte ho rather than jo aapke aur madam dekho pata hai kafi samay se mai check kar pa rahi hu aap buylead to consume matlab kar nahi rahe ho kyunki buylead aap dekho na madam pichle agar kyunki madam dekho agar aap active nahi ho na to kahi na kahi hamare system ko ye feed mai ye nahi keh rahi hu ki aap galat buylead consume karo jo bhi aapke system ko subah sham ek baar login kariye agar jo buylead aapke kaam ki hai madam usko jaake aap consume kariye agar kaam ki nahi hai to not interested mark kariye plus me madam jo direct inquiries vgera aapko aa rahi hai na aap unpe bhi agar reply call back karte ho to wo bhi hamare system me as a active user consider hota hai madam to aap wo activity bhi kariye aur madam dekho aap na kyunki dekho aapka product line na madam aisa nahi hai ki ye competitive product line hai agar aap isme dekhoge hamare paas bahut sare seller hain jo aaj ki date me aapko bhi pata hai madam ek lead sirf paanch seller ko dikhti hai agar paanch seller consume kar liya to sixth ke liye wo dikhegi hi nahi aur but agar aap active nahi ho madam to na to aapko alert time se milega aur na hi wo buylead aap consume kar paoge hai na madam? Thoda sa system ko aap app ke through aap thoda sa active rahiye madam subah sham jaise aap whatsapp vgera chalate ho wo kariye baki aapne jaise related jo issue hai madam wo feedback mera taken hai mai aapka account manager change karwa deti hu. Okay madam thik hai aap call kar lena. Haan madam is call ke baad na aapko ek feedback aayega please usko yes mark kar dijiyega mai account manager change kara ke unse call bhi kara dungi aapko thik hai na? Okay okay thik hai. Thik thik okay thik hai madam thank you so much madam have a good day. Welcome madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not understanding the process.

- Consuming different products, not getting benefit.

- Wants account manager to focus on products.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to convey feedback to account manager.

- Agreed to change the account manager.

- Explained how to use India Filter in buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will be changed.

- Customer will receive a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, product, feedback
